item.title: Pets!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I’ve had little pets like mice and stuff, never really cared about them that much.

But i’ve always had my cat, he’s always been there for me. Times when I’ve felt no one will listen to me, he is always there to dry up my tears in his fur (I don’t know why the fuck he does that lol) and ofcourse he agree’s with everything i say, he also even sits when you tell him too. I could go on forever talking about mad shit that he does but its probably not wise. He is getting old (almost 15) he doesn’t show any signs of aging. Even thinking about having to have him put down almost makes me well up.

We all have attachments to pets, infact if you’ve never had a pet while growing up; I think you’ve missed out on something. Unfortunately their lives are substantially shorter than ours and we cannot make the pet live forever. Just make your pets life happy, that way you can get on with your life. I’m sure if they could they would say “thank you” for even letting them stay in your house than they would.

Sorry to hear about your dog bootnecklad, you and your family made the right choice to end his suffering. Try to take solace in the fact that I’m sure he thanks you and your family for letting him be part of the family.

Read full topic
